title: Bug 120216: Group dialog should be shown even if dataset is not set.
OB: An error is shown when trying to create a new table group without setting the dataset.
EB: Bug 120216: Group dialog should be shown even if dataset is not set. Add a table report item without setting the dataset and try creating a new table group. The user should be able to go and define a group, even if the dataset is not defined.
SR:
1. Open the software.
2. Add a table report item without setting the dataset.
3. Try creating a new table group.
